main.name: Asset
main.description: The main Asset constructor. The object returned by `Assets.get()` is an instance of this.

arguments.name: mime
arguments.description: The mime type of this asset.

children.name: mime
children.description: The mime type string as provided by the `Content-Type` header. Only available after the XHR Request has reached readyState 2.

children.name: done
children.description: Whether this asset is done loading. This includes errors, so an XHR Request that fails will result in `done` being `true`.

children.name: error
children.description: Whether this asset has encountered an error while loading.
